comment._content: he was a sculptor, best known for Abraham Lincoln at Lincoln Memorial. Here is another photo and Wikipedia bio: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daniel_Chester_French

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Harry Angstrom: Thanks for the information on Mr. French. Since he is often referred to by his full name of Daniel Chester French, we will add that when we update the record.
